lead_paragraph: With the onslaught of smartphones and tablets, even people who depend on PCs now lack passion for these onetime miracle products.

headline.print_headline: Outshone by Smaller Screens, PCs Aim to Be Seen as Cool Again
headline.main: Outshone by Smaller Screens, PCs Aim to Be Seen as Cool Again

snippet: With the onslaught of smartphones and tablets, even people who depend on PCs now lack passion for these onetime miracle products.
abstract: HP Inc chief executive Dion Weisler is prepared to announce new laptop called Spectre, which is only 11 millimeters thick; device is part of company's effort to show that laptops, which are increasingly being replaced by smartphones and tablets, can still generate interest and sales as fetish objects.
